summary: Welcome to version 0.45.0 of MouseHunt Improved! This update has been a long time coming and has a lot of changes. There has been a ton of work done to improve performance and memory usage. There are also quite a few new features and updates to existing features. There are also a lot of bug fixes and style updates. Enjoy!

details.title: New feature modules
items: Big Timer - Click the timer to toggle between normal and big sizes.
Delayed Menus - Adds a short delay to the menu dropdowns to prevent accidental clicks
Codex at Bottom - Move the codex to the bottom of the trap selector.
Replace Favicon - Replace the favicon with a more fitting one
Shield Goes to Camp - On any page that isn't the Camp page, clicking the shield will take you to the Camp page, otherwise it will take your to your Hunter Profile

items: Close button on popup is now always clickable
